entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
